sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent { hora = ("00" + new Date().getHours()).slice(-2) + ":" + ("00" + new Date().getMinutes()).slice(-2); data = ("00" + new Date().getDate()).slice(-2) + "/" + ("00" + new Date().getMonth()).slice(-2) + "/" + new Date().getFullYear() + " - " + this.hora; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) {} }
